Title: Desktop Info
Description:
Do you want to display informations on your desktop? Well this is the solution for you. 

Created using WPF and MEF Framework from .NET 4.0

Easy to extend and easy to configure
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Do you want to display informations on your desktop? Well this is the solution for you.

Created using WPF and MEF Framework from .NET 4.0

Easy to extend and easy to configure

Technologies to be used: Microsoft .net framework 4.0, WPF, MEF
Other to be used (possibly): FlickrApi, Windows Sensors and Location Platform, Google Data Protocol (for .NET), Google Maps
